official_title: To provide for the payment by the Secretary of the Interior of undedicated receipts into the Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund.
short_title: Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund Act of 1989

summary.text: Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund Act of 1989 - Provides for the payment by the Secretary of the Interior into the Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund of undedicated receipts equal to the Fund shortfall for a fiscal year.

titles.title: Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund Act of 1989
To provide for the payment by the Secretary of the Interior of undedicated receipts into the Refuge Revenue Sharing Fund.
